meanings.definition: Excessive or unreasonable amounts or degrees
meanings.sent1: The inordinatenesses of his collection of toys filled the entire room.
meanings.sent2: She was overwhelmed by the inordinatenesses of gifts she received on her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The inordinatenesses of ice cream toppings on his dessert made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her love for animals reached inordinatenesses, as she adopted every stray she found.
meanings.sent5: The inordinatenesses of colors in the sunset painted the sky in a breathtaking display.

meanings.sent1: His inordinatenesses in spending led to financial troubles.
meanings.sent2: The inordinatenesses of her laughter echoed through the entire house.
meanings.sent3: The inordinatenesses of his excitement caused him to jump up and down uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: Her inordinatenesses in eating sweets resulted in a stomachache.
meanings.sent5: The inordinatenesses of his fear made him freeze in place, unable to move.
